snippet: A concert on Wednesday evening featuring Philip Glass, who celebrated his 75th birthday in January, opened a three-evening benefit, with Mr. Glass playing three of his piano études.
abstract: Zachary Woolfe reviews performance by Philip Glass and other musicians in the concert Philip Glass: Music With Friends at Issue Project Room.
lead_paragraph: A concert on Wednesday evening featuring Philip Glass, who celebrated his 75th birthday in January, opened a three-evening benefit, with Mr. Glass playing three of his piano études.

headline.seo: Philip Glass at Issue Project Room
headline.main: A Birthday Concert in Three Parts
headline.print_headline: A Birthday Concert In Three Parts
